prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon inspired by ocean creatures with vibrant shells and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a pearl inside a beautiful shell, emphasizing elegance and rarity.
Design a unique aquatic Pokemon that has a shiny blue exterior and a soft, pink interior.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon with a round body and a large, open shell for protection.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in underwater environments, showcasing its colorful and eye-catching features.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea, with smooth curves and a calm personality.
Give me a visual of a Pokemon that can evolve into a powerful creature, starting from a tiny shell.

distinctive_features: Soft pink coloration in the center
